title: feat: add web search models and tool config to OpenClaw
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: OpenClaw surfs the web
gist.blurb: OpenClaw gets a major upgrade with web search capabilities! We've added Gemini Search and Perplexity integration, plus a fresh coat of paint on the UI.
gist.summary: Integrated web search capabilities via Gemini and Perplexity models, updated the model roster with Claude Opus and Gemini Pro, and refined the user interface layout.
gist.impact: Users can now get up-to-date, web-grounded answers and access more powerful reasoning models within a cleaner interface.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations Bee playing a retro pixel art claw machine (representing OpenClaw). The claw is lowering down to pick up a glowing holographic globe (representing web search) instead of a toy. The scene is warm and cozy.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot playing a tiny retro claw machine. The mechanical claw is picking up a glowing pixelated globe. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'WEB SEARCH'. Nostalgic but beautiful.
